maths.title: Ancient to Modern Shockwaves
maths.intro: Each round reveals a moment in history. Jot the year (1–4 digits), then add your five answers together.
maths.note: Years are AD only; closest total takes the round.

events.prompt: Eruption of Mount Vesuvius destroys Pompeii.
Fall of the Western Roman Empire (Romulus Augustulus is deposed).
The Fall of Constantinople to the Ottoman Empire.
Russia launches a full-scale invasion of Ukraine.

clues: Eruption of Mount Vesuvius destroys Pompeii.
Fall of the Western Roman Empire (Romulus Augustulus is deposed).
The Fall of Constantinople to the Ottoman Empire.
Russia launches a full-scale invasion of Ukraine.

reveals.prompt: Eruption of Mount Vesuvius destroys Pompeii.
Fall of the Western Roman Empire (Romulus Augustulus is deposed).

maths.question: Enter the year you think this event happened (1–4 digits).
